subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Randy Wolf, who went 9-6 in 2007 for the Dodgers before shoulder trouble sidelined him midseason, agreed to a one-year, $5 million deal with the team Friday. The left-handed Wolf, 32, went a combined 12-12 with a 4.30 earned run average with San Diego and Houston last year.
